instance.title: Summary instance details
instance.description: Return the summary details about an instance

_id.description: The unique identifier (instance name) for this instance

_created.description: The (unix timestamp) date value on which this instance was created

_shadow.description: Indicates cases when the instance is only referred to and not explicitly defined.

_label.description: The text that should be used when rendering this instance.

annotations.description: The annotations that apply to this instance.

icon.description: The filename of the image that should be used to graphically render this instance.

direct_concept_names.description: A list of concept names that this instance is directly asserted as being. Inferred concept names are not listed here.

inherited_concept_names.description: A list of concept names that this instance is indirectly asserted as being. Direct concept names are not listed here.

property_values.description: Property names and their values for this instance.

property_types.description: Property names and their types for this instance

primary_sentence_count.description: The number of primary sentences that define this instance

secondary_sentence_count.description: The number of secondary sentences that refer to this instance
